topic.title: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (CANCER FIRST SEEN)
topic.shortdesc: PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION ISSUER CODE (CANCER FIRST SEEN) is the code which identifies the PROFESSIONAL REGISTRATION BODY of the CARE PROFESSIONAL who first sees the PATIENT following the initial referral which leads to the cancer diagnosis.
